mapper.insert: insert into faq ( faq_writer, title, faq_pinned, faq_writing, expose_start, expose_end, content, reg_date ) values ( #{faqWriter}, #{title}, #{faqPinned}, #{faqWriting}, #{exposeStart}, #{exposeEnd}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.update: update faq set faq_pinned = #{faqPinned}, faq_writing = #{faqWriting}, expose_start = #{exposeStart}, expose_end = #{exposeEnd}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where faq_id = #{faqId}
